  • Method Details

    • validate

      ValidationReport validate(Path toValidate) throws PackageParser.ParseException, FileNotFoundException
      Validate an ODF document from a path.
      Parameters:
      toValidate - the path to the document to validate
      Returns:
      the ValidationResult for the document
      Throws:
      PackageParser.ParseException - if the document cannot be parsed
      FileNotFoundException - if the document cannot be found

    • validate

      ValidationReport validate(Path toValidate, Formats legal) throws PackageParser.ParseException, FileNotFoundException
      Validate a path, only files of a specific ODF format are allowed. This method will check if the file is an ODF document and if it is of the specified format. If the file is not an ODF document, it will return a validation result indicating that the file is not an ODF document. If the file is an ODF document but not of the specified format, it will return a validation result indicating that the file is not of the expected .
      Parameters:
      toValidate - the path to the document to validate
      legal - the expected format of the document
      Returns:
      the validation result
      Throws:
      PackageParser.ParseException - if the document cannot be parsed
      FileNotFoundException - if the document cannot be found

    • validate

      ValidationResult validate(OpenDocument toValidate) throws IOException
      Validate an OpenDocument.
      Parameters:
      toValidate - the OpenDocument to validate
      Returns:
      the ValidationResult for the document
      Throws:
      IOException - if the document cannot be read

    • profile

      ValidationReport profile(Path toProfile, Profile profile) throws PackageParser.ParseException, FileNotFoundException
      Profile check a document using a specific profile.
      Parameters:
      toProfile - the path to the document to profile
      profile - the profile to use
      Returns:
      the ProfileResult for the document
      Throws:
      PackageParser.ParseException - if the document cannot be parsed
      FileNotFoundException - if the document cannot be found
